mapper.select: select A.review_id AS reviewId ,A.member_uuid AS memberUuid ,B.name AS memberName ,A.content ,A.created_at AS createdAt ,A.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM reviews AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN member AS B ON A.member_uuid = B.member_uuid WHERE A.apt_seq = #{aptSeq} AND A.member_uuid = #{memberUuid} ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{pageRequestDto.size} OFFSET #{pageRequestDto.offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (member_uuid, content, created_at, updated_at, apt_seq) VALUES (#{memberUuid}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{aptSeq})
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: select mb.name AS memberName, rv.content AS content, rv.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM reviews AS rv JOIN member AS mb ON rv.member_uuid = mb.member_uuid WHERE rv.apt_seq = #{aptSeq} ORDER BY rv.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
